column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A woman drove a Prius car at high speed and hit a motorcycle-trailer
column4: causing a man to be seriously injured and sent to the hospital at 11:20 pm on August 9
column5: 2020 near the railway line in Sangkat Kakap II
column7: Phnom Penh.------According to sources at the scene
column9: they saw the moto-trailer without a license plate
column10: driven by a man in the direction from west to east
column11: when the Prius with license plate Phnom Penh 2AI-9144
column12: driven by a woman and another female passenger came at high speed from east to west
column13: crashing into the moto. The car driver tried to escape from the scene and drove on for about a kilometer
column14: then swerved and crashed into a ditch. The female driver was then arrested..------After the incident
column15: the local police arrived and contacted the Phnom Penh Municipal Road Traffic Police to store the vehicles at the Phnom Penh Municipal Police
column16: waiting for a legal settlement later. ------NKD
